shake-tweaks.disable-screen-bobbing.desc: Disables the screen shake when moving.
shake-tweaks.disable-hand-bobbing.descri: Disables the hand shake when moving.
shake-tweaks.disable-map-bobbing.descrip: Disables the hand shake when holding a map. Does nothing if "Disable Hand Bobbing" is turned on.
Disables the screen shake when taking damage.
shake-tweaks.disable-hand-damage-tilt.de: Disables the hand shake when taking damage.
